nodes.text: Twilight was a Force-sensitive woman, who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic. She was rumored to be a former member of the Jedi Order and she was one of a group of colonists who settled on the shadowy moon Dyspeth in about 900 BBY. She persuaded other Force-sensitive colonists to unite with her to form the Disciples of Twilight, so that they could adapt to the darkness of Dyspeth.
